Dr. Pablo Guzman

I'm a Senior Research Scientist

About Me

About Me

Welcome to my personal website.

My name is Pablo. I am a Senior PhD in Computer Vision and also a MS majoring in Computer Science. I am currently a research consultant.

  • Name: Dr. Pablo Guzman
  • Website: https://pablitinho.github.io/
  • Email: Contact
  • City: Granada
  • Interests: Deep Learning, Computer Vision, Autonomous Driving
Education

Education

  • 2004

    Bachelor of Engineering in Computer Science (UGR)

    • Statistics, Databases, Data Structures, Structure and Computer Technology, Mathematical Analysis.
    • Numerical Calculation, Algebra and Discrete Structures, Software Engineering, Programming Methodology.
    • Algorithms and Theory, Operating Systems, Accounting, Business Economics, Fundamentals of Logic Programming.
    • Fundamentals of Computer Technology, Introduction to Computer, Discrete Mathematics.
    • Computer Models, Database Programming, Computer Networks, Computer Audit.
    • User Interface Design, Design and Evaluation of Settings, Physical Fundamentals of Computing. Maintenance of Computers, Geographic Information Systems.

  • 2010

    Master of Engineering in Computer Architectures and Networks (UGR)

    • Computer Architecture and Engineering, Software Engineering, Artificial Intelligence, Languages Processors.
    • Data Communication And Computer Networks, Bioinformatics, Programmable Logic Controllers.
    • Automatic Design Of Digital Systems, Microelectronics Circuit Design, Applied Physics.
    • Pattern Recognition, Industrial Robotics, Digital Control Systems, Automatic Synthesis VLSI Architectures.
    • Computer Aided Design, Applied Industrial Electronics, Industrial Computers, Electrical Technology.

  • 2015

    PhD. Thesis Title: “Implementation of Models for Image Processing Applications with Real-Time Constraints.

    Cum Laude.

    For further information, please read the research period in Work section.

    Performed 7 months of stay in the University of Linköping (Linköping, Sweden) with the professor Michael Felsberg in the Computer Vision Lab.

  • 2024-Current

    Post Doc. MOTHER: iMage classificatiOn in THe Extreme univeRse.

Experience

Professional Experience

    Colegio la Presentación: Administrative software for education management.

    Software Developer & Technical Engineer at Doppelmayr Spain

    www.doppelmayr.com

    Software development, technical translations, electric and electronic installations, documentation.

    Researcher at CITIC, Granada, Spain

    citic.ugr.es

    Ultrasound imaging, GPU (OpenCL, CUDA), real-time biomedical imaging, driver assistance systems.

  • Mar 2014 – Dic 2014

    Software Consulter at MSG SYSTEMS AG

    www.msg-systems.com

    Syntactic code analysis, error corrections, maintenance.

  • May 2015 – Jul 2016

    Computer Vision Engineer at Adasens Automotive GmbH

    www.adasens.com

    Embedded software (Tegra), Lane detection, Drowsiness detection, Dirtiness detection, Lane Change Assistance.

  • Oct 2016 – Jan 2021

    Computer Vision Engineer at DENSO ADAS Engineering Services GmbH

    www.denso.com

    Embedded software, code optimization, Computer Vision research, Eyelid detection, Lane Change Assistance, Structure from Motion, SLAM.

  • Mar 2021 – Sep 2022

    Computer Vision Engineer at Oosto (Formerly Anyvision)

    www.oosto.com

    Deep learning optimization, ARM architectures, embedded GPUs, DSPs, DL network optimization, Smart camera integration.

  • May 2023 – March 2024

    AI Director at Ubyko

    www.ubyko.com

    Deep learning, Point Cloud, 3D Geometry.

    https://www.iaa.csic.es/

Publications

Publications, Conferences, Books & Patents

Publication Guzmán, P.; Díaz, J.; Agís, R.; Ros, E. (2010). Optical Flow in a Smart Sensor Based on Hybrid Analog-Digital Architecture. Sensors, 10, 2975-2994.
Publication Guzmán, P., Díaz, J., Ralli, J., Agís, R., & Ros, E. (2011). Low-cost sensor to detect overtaking based on optical flow. Machine Vision and Applications, 1-13.
Publication Ralli, J., Díaz, J., Guzmán, P., & Ros, E. (2012). Experimental Study of Image Representation Spaces in Variational Disparity Calculation. EURASIP Journal on Advances in Signal Processing, 2012(1), 254.
Publication Guzman, P., Ros, R., & Ros, E. (2014). Artery Segmentation in Ultrasound Images Based on an Evolutionary Scheme. Informatics, 1(1), 52-71.
Publication Guzman, P., Hamarneh, G., Ros, R., & Ros, E. (2014). Arterial Mechanical Motion Estimation Based on a Semi-Rigid Body Deformation Approach. Sensors, 14(6), 9429-9450.
Conference Agís Rodrigo, Díaz Javier, Ortigosa Pilar, Guzmán Pablo, Ros Eduardo (2011). Optical Flow Reliability Model Approximated with RBF. IWANN (2), 90-97.
Book Prieto, A. Periféricos Avanzados. Smart Cameras: Sensores ópticos avanzados para aplicaciones industriales de visión. Pablo Guzmán Sánchez, Rodrigo Agís Melero, Ester Martín Garzón. ISBN: 978-84-15452-03-4.
